rule.withPositive: Anyone with a positive reputation can start discussions.
rule.with10: Anyone with a reputation 10+ can start discussions.
rule.with100: Anyone with a reputation 100+ can start discussions.

banner.willBe: Your club will remain active for the first 14 days. After this period, the club will need to have at least 3 experts to be active. Otherwise, you and other members of the club will not be able to ask new questions.
banner.is: This club is not active and new content cannot be added.

fab.error0: You cannot ask questions now, because the club is not active. Clubs should have at least 8 experts.
fab.error1: You cannot ask questions now, because your profile has been banned.
fab.error2: You cannot ask questions now, because your reputation is negative.
fab.error3: You cannot ask questions now, because your reputation is not high enough or you are not a resident.

request.describe: Describe why you should become a expert. Tell other experts about your unique knowledge or plans.

invite.info: To invite new experts to the club you can generate an invite link. This link will be valid for 24 hours and can be used only one time.
invite.ready: Your invite link is ready. Now you can copy and send it to the potential expert of your club.
invite.message: Hello, I am inviting you to become a expert of my club on Addspire. To accept the invitation, simply click the link below:
invite.warn0: Each club can have up to 8 experts.
invite.warn1: Please note that all experts have equal rights and cannot remove other experts from the club. Invite only people you know who can bring value to the club.

requests.warnDecline: Are you sure you want to decline the expert request?
requests.warnAccept: Are you sure you want to accept the expert request?
requests.info: Note that all experts including you have equal rights and cannot delete other experts. Also, clubs can have not more than 8 experts.

buttons.warn0: Are you sure you want to leave this club?
buttons.warn1: You will not be able to become an expert unless an expert of this club accepts your request.

buttons.warnA: Are you sure you want to delete this answer?

buttons.canEdit: You can edit your answer if you want to improve it.
buttons.sure: Are you sure you want to accept this answer as the best one? You can accept only one answer.

cookie.title: Accept cookies from Addspire on this browser?

head.title: Addspire - Q&A clubs with experts, reputation, and coins
head.description: On Addspire you can discuss and answer questions and anyone can join the discussion. In a club you connect with the top experts and you can choose the best contractor or business based on the reputation and answers. As an expert or business you have a great chance to show your expertise, customer care and build reputation by giving top answers. Anyone who makes contributions in a club in the form of valuable questions, answers and comments can earn coins distributed by Addspire or rewarded as a bonus.

upload.warn1: You need to grant camera permissions to use this app.
